INSERT INTO TB_Daily_Stat_Bottle(
) SELECT DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day),'%Y/%m/%d'), IFNULL(input_count,0),IFNULL(charge_count,0),IFNULL(sales_count,0),IFNULL(back_count,0),IFNULL(discard_count,0),'admin',now() from ( SELECT count(bottle_id) input_count FROM TB_Bottle WHERE delete_yn='N' AND bottle_work_cd ='0301' AND DATE_FORMAT(bottle_work_dt,'%Y/%m/%d')= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day),'%Y/%m/%d') ) a, ( SELECT count(bottle_id) charge_count FROM TB_Bottle WHERE delete_yn='N' AND bottle_work_cd ='0305' AND DATE_FORMAT(bottle_work_dt,'%Y/%m/%d')= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day),'%Y/%m/%d') ) b, ( SELECT count(bottle_id) sales_count FROM TB_Bottle WHERE delete_yn='N' AND bottle_work_cd ='0308' AND DATE_FORMAT(bottle_work_dt,'%Y/%m/%d')= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day),'%Y/%m/%d')) c, ( SELECT count(bottle_id) back_count FROM TB_Bottle WHERE delete_yn='N' AND bottle_work_cd ='0309' AND DATE_FORMAT(bottle_work_dt,'%Y/%m/%d')= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day),'%Y/%m/%d') ) d, ( SELECT count(bottle_id) discard_count FROM TB_Bottle WHERE delete_yn='N' AND bottle_work_cd ='0399' AND DATE_FORMAT(bottle_work_dt,'%Y/%m/%d')= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day),'%Y/%m/%d') ) e

INSERT INTO TB_Monthly_Stat_Product(
) SELECT Product_ID,DATE_FORMAT(A.Create_Dt,'%Y%m'), SUM(Bottle_Count),SUM(Bottle_Amount),#{createId}, NOW() FROM TB_Bottle_Product A, TB_Bottle B WHERE DATE_FORMAT(A.Create_dt,'%Y%m')= DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y%m') AND B.Bottle_Process_CD !='0299' AND B.Bottle_ID = A.Bottle_ID GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(A.Create_Dt,'%Y%m'),A.Product_Id
